snippet: A Vermont man found guilty of lying about his participation in Bosnian war crimes in 1992, but later granted a new trial, agreed on Wednesday to give up his United States citizenship and leave the country.
lead_paragraph: A Vermont man found guilty of lying about his participation in Bosnian war crimes in 1992, but later granted a new trial, agreed on Wednesday to give up his United States citizenship and leave the country.

headline.main: Vermont: Bosnian Muslim to Give Up U.S. Citizenship
headline.print_headline: Vermont: Bosnian Muslim To Give Up U.S. Citizenship

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
